text: ya 'ayuha alnabiu qul li'azwajik wabanatik wanisa' almuminin yrkhyn ealaa rwwshn wwjwhhn min ardythn wmlahfhn; lstr wjwhhn wsdwrhn wrwwshn; dhlk 'aqrab 'ana ymyazn balstr walsyant, fala yutearrad lahuna bmkrwh 'aw adha. wakan allah ghfwrana rhymana hayth ghafar lakum maa slf, wrhmkm bima 'awdah lakum min alhlal walhram
